I just put it in the same category if it can think, is
mechanical, and turns from one thing to another. The
zords can't think (unless you count the galacta beasts
from Lost Galaxy).

--- Alloran2@... wrote:
> OOC: Waitaminute, since when is every toy or show
> with transforming robots 
> Transformers??  Power Rangers have transforming
> robots, and they aren't 
> Transformers.  Transforming robots have existed in
> Japan since the 70's, 
> years before Transformers.
>
